title: Basic Landing Page Template
description: This is a complete basic Landing Page template built with simple basic components, ready to use out of the box with minimal configuration, perfect for quickly building product landing pages.

simpleDesign.title: Simple Design
simpleDesign.description: All components adopt a clean design style, focusing on core functionality

minimalConfig.title: Minimal Configuration
minimalConfig.description: Only requires basic configuration to use, reducing learning costs

quickDeploy.title: Quick Deployment
quickDeploy.description: Perfect for projects that need to go live quickly, saving development time
